name: Family Tree
visualLanguageLines: # Node definitions - map domain people to visual nodes
Node( node_id: x, label: x, shape: "circle", border: "solid", fontsize: "14") :- Person(x);
# Edge definitions - map domain parent relationships to visual edges
Edge(source_id: source, target_id: target, color: "black", style: "solid", arrowhead: "normal", arrowtail: "") :- Parent(source, target);
